title: Portfolio Designer Web and Graphic
intro: I work in creating and developing visual interfaces for online and offline media.
designer: Information architecture and wireframes to the implementation of user-centered UX/UI interfaces.
bio: Solid experience in front-end web development, designing information architecture and wireframes to implementing user-centric UX/UI interfaces.
Knowledge of agile methodologies, code versioning with Git and implementation of good development practices.
Skills in responsive design, performance optimization, web accessibility and SEO.
Creation of visual identities for brands and packaging through to final artwork for printing.
